baseParticleMass(uint256).return: The Amount of DAI held in the Token

params._amount: The amount of tokens to burn (always 1 for Non-Fungibles)
params._tokenId: The ID of the token to burn

params._amounts: The amounts of the tokens to burn (always 1 for Non-Fungibles)
params._tokenIds: The IDs of the tokens to burn

params._type: The Type ID of the Token

canMint(uint256,uint256).return: True if the user can mint the token type

params._isNF: True if the Type is a Non-Fungible (only Non-Fungible Tokens can hold DAI and generate interest)
params._isPrivate: True if the Type is Private and can only be minted by the creator; otherwise anyone can mint
params._maxSupply: The Max Supply of Tokens that can be minted
params._requiredDai: The amount of DAI (in WEI) that is required to Mint a Token of this Type (the Particle Mass)                         NOTE: This will be ignored for Fungible Tokens (ERC20)
params._uri: A unique URI for the Token Type which will serve the JSON metadata

createParticleWithEther(string,bool,bool.return: The ID of the newly created Particle Type

params._isNF: True if the Type is a Non-Fungible (only Non-Fungible Tokens can hold DAI and generate interest)
params._isPrivate: True if the Type is Private and can only be minted by the creator; otherwise anyone can mint
params._requiredDai: The amount of DAI (in WEI) that is required to Mint a Token of this Type (the Particle Mass)                         NOTE: This will be ignored for Fungible Tokens (ERC20)
params._uri: A unique URI for the Token Type which will serve the JSON metadata

createParticleWithIons(string,bool,bool,.return: The ID of the newly created Particle Type     * NOTE: Must approve THIS contract to TRANSFER your IONS on your behalf

currentParticleCharge(uint256).return: The amount of interest the Token has generated (in Funding Token; DAI)

dischargeParticle(uint256).return: The amount of interest released from the token (in Funding Token; DAI)

params._isNF: True if the Type of Token to Create is a Non-Fungible Token

getCreationPrice(bool).return: The ETH price to create a type

params._type: The Type ID of the Token

params._amount: The amount of tokens to mint (always 1 for Non-Fungibles)
params._data: Custom data used for transferring tokens into contracts
params._to: The owner address to assign the new token to
params._type: The Type ID of the new token to mint

mintParticle(address,uint256,uint256,byt.return: The ID of the newly minted token     * NOTE: Must approve THIS contract to TRANSFER your DAI on your behalf

params._amounts: The amount of tokens to mint (always 1 for Non-Fungibles)
params._data: Custom data used for transferring tokens into contracts
params._to: The owner address to assign the new tokens to
params._types: The Type IDs of the new tokens to mint

mintParticles(address,uint256[],uint256[.return: The IDs of the newly minted tokens     * NOTE: Must approve THIS contract to TRANSFER your DAI on your behalf

setup(address,address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Setup the DAI/CHAI contracts and configure the contract

params._from: The owner address to transfer the Charge from
params._fromTokenId: The Token ID to transfer the Charge from
params._toTokenId: The Token ID to transfer the Charge to

params._amount: The Amount of Charge to be transferred - must be <= particle charge
params._from: The owner address to transfer the Charge from
params._fromTokenId: The Token ID to transfer the Charge from
params._toTokenId: The Token ID to transfer the Charge to

withdrawFees().details: Allows contract owner to withdraw any fees earned

baseParticleMass(uint256).notice: Gets the Amount of Base DAI held in the Token (amount token was minted with)

burnParticle(uint256,uint256).notice: Destroys a Particle and releases the underlying DAI + Interest (Mass + Charge)

burnParticles(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Destroys multiple Particles and releases the underlying DAI + Interest (Mass + Charge)

canMint(uint256,uint256).notice: Checks if a user is allowed to mint a Token by Type ID

createParticleWithEther(string,bool,bool.notice: Creates a new Particle Type which can later be minted/burned

createParticleWithIons(string,bool,bool,.notice: Creates a new Particle Type which can later be minted/burned

currentParticleCharge(uint256).notice: Gets the amount of interest the Token has generated (it's accumulated particle-charge)

dischargeParticle(uint256).notice: Allows the owner of the Token to collect the interest generated form the token without removing the underlying DAI that is held in the token

getContractOwner().notice: Gets the address of the contract owner.

getCreationPrice(bool).notice: Gets the ETH price to create a Token Type

getCreator(uint256).notice: Gets the Creator of a Token Type

mintParticle(address,uint256,uint256,byt.notice: Mints a new Particle of the specified Type (can be Fungible or Non-Fungible)         Note: Requires DAI to mint Non-Fungible Tokens

mintParticles(address,uint256[],uint256[.notice: Mints multiple new Particles of the specified Types (can be Fungible and/or Non-Fungible)         Note: Requires DAI to mint Non-Fungible Tokens

transferCharge(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Transfers a tokens full-charge from one particle to another

transferCharge(address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Transfers some of a tokens charge from one particle to another

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers the ownership of the contract to new address
